_____________

scriptSig: len(scriptSig), len(data), data, len(unhashed_original_script), unhashed_original_script

witnessStacks: <numStacks> <segwitVersion> len(sha256(original_script)) sha256(original_script)
_____________

-------------

>>> data = bytes.fromhex("15686176652066756e2073746179696e6720706f6f7287")
>>> sha256(data).hexdigest()
